section.title: Using the Virtual Machine Comparison Sections
section.para: Use the comparison sections to view various comparison data and display the data in different ways.

step.para: On the left of a comparison screen, select what categories of properties to display.
Click the plus sign next to the sections name to expand it.

The following descriptions pertain to the Expanded View
. Whether you see the value of a property or an icon representing the property depends on the properties type.

listitem.para: A property displayed in the same color as the base means that the compared virtual machine matches the base for that property.
A property displayed in a different color from the base means that the compared virtual machine does not match the base for that property.

step.para:
If you are in the Compressed View
, the values of the properties will not be displayed. The icons shown below will describe all items.

listitem.para:
A
(checkmark) means that the compared virtual machine matches the base for that property. If you hover over it, the value of the property will display.

A
(x) means that the compared virtual machine does not match the base for that property. If you hover over it, the value of the property will display.

step.para: Click the minus sign next to the sections name to collapse it.

formalpara.title: Result:
formalpara.para: Your comparison can be viewed in multiple ways. Export the data or create a report from your comparison for analysis using external tools.
